name: README.md
content:
Hello world.
============

* This is a test file!
* This is a very long line to check how we handle long lines. The plan is to use line-continuation characters in the future. This could be achieved by magic or by setting a background picture and wrapping text with CSS.
Are links highlighted properly? Ask [google](http://www.google.com)!

name: src/main/Test.java
